description: A hierarchical section in a taxonomy. In the Arc ecosystem, these are stored in the arc-site-service.
title: Section

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

___description.description: A short description or tagline about this site

___parent_id.description: The id of this section's parent section in the default hierarchy, if any.

$eref.description: The version of ANS that this object was serialized as, in major.minor.patch format.  For top-level content objects, this is a required trait.
$eref.title: Describes the ANS version of this object

$eref.description: The _id of the website on which this document exists. This field is only available in Content API. If different from canonical_website, then this document was originally sourced from the canonical_website. Generated at fetch time by Content API.
$eref.title: Website

___parent.description: The id of this section's parent section in various commonly-used hierarchies, where available.

$eref.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
$eref.title: Globally Unique ID trait

___path.description: The url path to this site
